summary: This mod turn the mage you can hire in Riften a little more sexy and utily...
descriptionHtml:
My first time posting a mod so be easy on me and let me know if anything went bad on it :)

I did that mod only \'cause I wished for a good look husband - and if he could be of any help it would be perfect!

My main char is a meele so I need a companion that would cover the mage-fight, so I choose the easy one aviable and turned him to my tasty - there is a few mage companions that should be a better choose, but I not into mage-fight and won\'t bother with the colege \'till had done all the rest, then I will not have access to them for a long time, so...

Its come in two flavours: Cheat and No-Cheat.

Commun:
->Better face, hair and eye
->Turned \"essential\"
->No default outfit so he will wear the armor you give him
->Combat style as DestructionMage by default

Cheat:
->Healt/Magicka/Stamina were put up to be 350/750/450
->Some cool stuff - all overpowered
->A few more spells - and some are very powerfull

No-Cheat:
->Better choise of spells
->Better choise of skill points

To install:
Just drag the meshes folder and the .esp to the \"DATA\" folder then active \"BetterMarcurio.esp\" on the launcher.

To uninstall:
Delete the follow files: 
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm\\000b9980.nif
Data\\BetterMarcurio.esp

Tools used:
Skyrim NPC Editor 0.60

Thanks:
Many thanks to foretrenty for that amazing tool and to Bethesda for another perfect game!

Permitions:
You are free to use my mod as you like, just don\'t forget to say thanks to foretrenty for the NPC editor.
author: Tsyell
